description:
Until we stop appealing to ""authority,"" we will never be free.
.
Most doctors who are militant about giving vaccines cannot name 5 ingredients in the vaccine.
.
Next time you go to your doctor, ask them the following and see how they respond:

1) why are there murdered baby cells and dna in the vaccine?

2) why are there heavy metals such as mercury and aluminum in the vaccine?

3) why is there polysorbate 20 & 80 in the vaccine?

4) why is first day infant mortality the highest in the USA compared to any other country in the world despite being the most heavily vaccinated?

5) why are vaccine manufacturers not liable for any injury you will most likely receive when taking vaccines?

6) why have food allergies grown exponentially? These same food allergies coincide with the proteins that they put into vaccines (lactose, eggs, peanut, soy, etc.)

7) why will 1 out of 20 boys in New Jersey (one of the most heavily vaccinated states in the country) be diagnosed with autism? Why have autism rates increased as vaccination rates and doses also increase?

8) if your going to appeal to ""herd immunity,"" why can't we obtain herd immunity by catching the wild virus? Why can't we allow our immune system to do its job? Why do we need to inject ourselves with the same virus in combination with harmful ingredients in order to obtain herd immunity? (Follow the money)
.
Ask any doctor those questions, and I guarantee you will loose all faith in that doctor by how they respond.
.
ASK QUESTIONS!
.
.
